name: jinglebells
title: Jingle Bells Decorations
author: quedafoe & staurran
description: Jingle Bells Decorations brings the festive spirit of the holidays to Factorio with unique decorations like lights and other seasonal items. The mod also introduces a new type of armor that leaves a trail of damaging fire as you walk, adding both an aesthetic and practical touch to your base. Celebrate the holidays in style while defending your factory!
